translations: v．（尤指攀岩运动中）沿绳滑降：通过固定在高处的绳索，利用摩擦力控制速度，从高处向下滑降。

sentences.sentence: Fog covers the valleys behind as a man is abseiled from a cable car during an annual rescue exercise at the funicular to Mount Pilatus (6, 982 ft) near Luzer, Switzerland on Nov. 9.
sentences.translation: 瑞士—Luzer： 一年一次的救援演习中，一名男子正吊在通往皮拉图斯峰（pilatusi）的索道上滑行。 在他下面，山谷被大雾覆盖。
